title: Enjoy the Lifestyle You Deserve in this Unbeatable 2 Bedroom Home.
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today!', 'Check out the video walkthroughs of our community!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'Deeply Affordable Apartments At Almost $400 Less Per Month Than Nearby Communities!', 'HURRY – our new rent-restricted apartments are going fast!', 'Submit your application paperwork quickly and easily today to reserve your brand-new home!', 'The search for your new active senior (55+) home stops here!', 'Conveniently located near various dining, shopping, and entertainment options, Bren Road Station is the perfect place to call home!', 'Offering 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartments, our spacious floor plans have a full-size washer & dryer in EVERY home, modern interior designs, individually controlled heating & air-conditioning, and a private patio or balcony.', 'Our brand-new amenities include a cozy community room with a fireplace, on-site fitness center, outdoor courtyard, and a heated underground parking garage.', 'We are also PET FRIENDLY!', 'Take your time to call one of our leasing specialists and book your tour today!', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- High-Speed Internet & Cable Ready', '- Picnic & Grilling Areas', '- Private Patio or Balcony Space', '- Open & Spacious 1, 2 & 3 Bedroom Floor Plans', '- Cards & Crafts Room', '- Central Heating & Air-Conditioning', '- Rooftop Solar-Panel Energy System', 'We are a pet-friendly community.', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'Bren Road Station participates in a Section 42 affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,320 | 2', 'Occupants: $56,340 | 3', 'Occupants: $63,360 | 4 Occupants: $70,380 | 5 Occupants: $76,020 | 6', 'Occupants: $81,660.', 'Under Section 42 rules, rents are not adjusted based on household income.', 'One household member must be at least 55 years of age, and all other members at least 40 years of age.', 'Please call for more details.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Tuesday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Thursday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Friday-Saturday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:11:00AM-5:00PM', 'Call today to learn more about our community:', 'show contact info', 'Bren Road Station 55+ Apartments', '11001 Bren Road East', 'Minnetonka, MN, 55343', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'N7Vn0vVT3V']
